overview: A two-part documentary made for French TV about Georges Perec, directed by his former partner Catherine Binet.  It features a mixture of archival footage, scenes from Perec’s films and to-camera readings of excerpts from his work by various actors and friends of the author (Michael Lonsdale, Marina Vlady, Alain Cuny, Sami Frey, Edith Scob, Harry Mathews and others).
title: Film sur Georges Perec
